title: Digimon Savers: Agumon! Gaomon! Lalamon! Bakuretsu! Jougai Last Battle!
synopsis: A recap of the whole Digimon Savers TV series in one episode, with original commentary by Agumon, Gaomon, and Lalamon, included in the final volume of the DVD releases.
characters: ['Agumon', 'Daimon, Masaru', 'Gaomon', 'Lalamon', 'Fujieda, Yoshino', 'BanchoLeomon', 'Norstein, Touma', 'Noguchi, Ikuto', 'Satsuma, Rentarou', 'Kurata, Akihiro']
voices: ['Matsuno, Taiki', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Yukana', 'Aragaki, Yui', 'Takemoto, Eiji', 'Nojima, Hirofumi', 'Kugimiya, Rie', 'Kikuchi, Masami']
